title: MBA Operations Management Capstone Project: Real-World Learning-Based Operational Improvement Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental operational management theories, basic data analysis, and project management methodologies
context.additional_context: Conducting projects to solve operational process issues in collaboration with actual corporate partners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically derive improvement plans by analyzing operational issues in real-world corporate environments
Learners can complete project deliverables reflecting at least three rounds of client feedback in collaboration with project team members
Learners can measure and report process improvement results using quantitative metrics (e.g., 15% productivity increase)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
